alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 29 at 8:36PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 AM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...Eastern Adams County, southeastern Weld County, and southern Morgan County. * WHEN...Until 230 AM MDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 833 PM MDT, Emergency services reported flooding in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen, and additional thunderstorms will produce more rainfall over portions of the Advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Fort Morgan, northeastern Aurora, eastern Denver International Airport, Brush, Bennett, Wiggins, Log Lane Village, Hoyt, Leader, Adena, Twelve-Mile Corner, Adena School, Roggen, Prospect Valley, Strasburg, Gary, Manila Village, Watkins and Hoyt Beet Dump.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
